display_name: Obstructive Apnea Hypopnea Index: (Obstructive apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal +  hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and >= 3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal) / hours of sleep from type III home sleep apnea test
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
